author: NICK PERRY and JOE McDONALD Associated Press
title: Bleak figures from China and US show economic hit from virus
description: Bleak figures from the world’s two largest economies underscore how quickly the coronavirus is undoing a decade of economic gains
content:
BEIJING -- 
Bleak figures from the world's two largest economies underscore how quickly the coronavirus is delivering a massive economic blow.
China on Friday reported GDP shrank 6.8% from a year ago in the quarter ending March, its worst contraction since … [+6350 chars]
